description.lang: ZL-100 is a simple controller for smart plugs and switches and serves as a complete bridge between Alexa voice control and Z-Wave Certified lighting control devices. Additional devices types will be added as future upgrades.The ZLINK hub supports the latest Z-Wave S2 Security.Use the ZLINK app to:Share home locations with other usersShare rooms with family membersSee 'What happened' in your homeManage your 'Favorite' devices from the same screen
